0x3FFFCF	1111111111111111001111	-> Works, but disconects
0x1FFFCF	0111111111111111001111
0xFFFCF		0011111111111111001111	-> Works with Guest-AccessNG!
0x7FFCF		0001111111111111001111
0x3FFCF		0000111111111111001111
0x1FFCF		0000011111111111001111
0xFFCF		0000001111111111001111
0x7FCF		0000000111111111001111
0x3FCF		0000000011111111001111
